quote_first: Grant knew animals often performed such mating rituals for hours at a time. They went without food, they paid attention to nothing else… .  He glanced at his watch.
title: Jurassic Park
author: Michael Crichton

quote_last: . There was a silence - a comfortable replete silence.”
title: And Then There Were None
author: Agatha Christie

title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time
